interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Come Dance With Me
Review Date: 2015/11/11
Store: Andrew McCarthy  (Actor),     Michelle Nolden  (Actor),     John Bradshaw  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
Product Description: ["Jack (Andrew McCarthy) is an executive in a financial brokerage firm trying to impress the firm's president, Drew Clayton (Chris Gillett), in hopes of a promotion. However, Jack is dating the fabulously rich and elegant Demi Clayton (Stephanie Mills), who happens to be Drew's daughter. Although Demi's mother Clarisse (Jane Moffat) doesn't necessarily approve of Jack and would prefer her daughter to date a man within their social circle, Jack still plans on proposing. Trying to create the perfect proposal, Jack signs up for dance lessons in preparation for his proposal to Demi at her father's lavish annual Christmas Dance. But when sparks start to fly between Jack and his dance instructor, Christine (Michelle Nolden), Jack will have to make some important decisions before it is too late."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '783536', 'Director': 'John Bradshaw', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Andrew McCarthy, Michelle Nolden', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Hallmark', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Very Sweet movie.  Great for the Holidays, but enjoyable anytime.
Review Title: Enjoyable
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

James Brolin  (Actor),     Barbara Eden  (Actor),     Michael Rhodes  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Mystery & Thrillers
['When San Francisco therapist Jesse Newman (', 'Barbara Eden', ", TV's", 'I Dream of Jeannie', ") experiences disturbingly lifelike hallucinations of a patient's murder, her friends, and former lover, Hal(", 'James Brolin', "), think she's lost her mind. But after Jesse leads police to the patient's body, they're convinced she's a killer! In a desperate race to prove her innocence, Jesse unlocks a devastating secret from her past that raises the stakes beyond anything she could have imagined."]

Berenstain Bears Box Set
Michael Cera  (Actor),     Camilla Scott  (Actor),     Gary Hurst  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
['Set in the rolling hills of Bear Country, this animated comedy stars a fun loving family of honey Bears whose love, loyalty and humor allow them to overcome any obstacle that finds its way down to their sunny dirt road. The funny, familiar experiences of this bear family instill timeless life lessons and reflect the traditional community values of country life.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary Update:**

- **Primary Interest:** The user maintains a strong focus on mystery and thriller genres while also embracing wholesome family narratives that engage audiences of all ages.
- **Engagement with Content:** Their recent purchase of a sweet, family-oriented film demonstrates an ongoing enthusiasm for stories that resonate with both children and adults, particularly those that are festive and heartwarming.
- **Preferred Formats:** The user continues to favor DVDs, showcasing a particular fondness for animated and family films that highlight diverse narratives and foster connections.
- **Quality Appreciation:** With a discerning eye, the user values storytelling that combines entertainment with moral lessons and emotional resonance, especially within family-centric films.
- **Influence of Actors:** Their appreciation for skilled performers remains consistent, as the user values well-developed characters that enhance complex plots, making narratives more engaging.
- **Cinematic Elements:** They seek films that entertain while offering valuable life insights, indicating a deep appreciation for storytelling that strengthens family bonds and provides enjoyable viewing experiences.
- **Overall Trend:** This latest acquisition reinforces the user’s commitment to thoughtful, quality storytelling in family films, emphasizing emotional depth and meaningful connections that resonate during the holiday season and beyond.
